name: Up and Down the Word Ladder: Part 2 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
The first word has two letters -

US army enlistee.

Now rearrange the letters of the previous word plus one new letter to create a word of three letters -

Apparatus for drilling oil wells.

This word has four letters -

Broad smile.

A word of five letters -

junction of inner thigh to (human) trunk.

This word has six letters -

District or territory.

A word of seven letters - 

From another country.

Now remove one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make a six letter word -

To pay no attention.

Drop another letter to create a word of five letters -

Period of monarch's rule.

This word has four letters - 

Area for boxing match.

The final word has three letters -

Eli Whitney's cotton machine.
